To: QUINTOS-TORRENT
Just DL ConvertXtoDVD, and register it (freely, of course), then DL a movie that includes an .SRT file (that's subtitles). When you convert and burn the movie, just add the .SRT file to the same place as the .AVI file, and it should burn your subtitle with the movie.

@ QUINTOS-TORRENT

If You have Subtitles For Your Movie In .srt Format. Make Sure The File name is as same as The Movie.
Example

Ong Bak 3 2010 DVDRip XviD AC3-ViSiON.avi
Ong Bak 3 2010 DVDRip XviD AC3-ViSiON.srt
